languages.text: Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Цель этой атаки выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Ловкости{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}штрафом{/g} −20 и в случае провала оказывается {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвиженной{/g}.

languages.text: Цель атаки должна совершить спасбросок рефлексов со штрафом 20 или стать обездвиженной

traits.locale_text: The target of this attack must pass an Agility resistance test with a −20 penalty or become immobilised.

The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

languages.text: Bu saldırının hedefi, −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç{/g} olur.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Bu saldırının hedefi, −20 ceza puanına sahip bir Çeviklik direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur.

Bu saldırının hedefi, −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ceza puanına{/g} sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Çeviklik{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde felç olur.

languages.text: El objetivo de este ataque debe superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilidad{/g} con una {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalización{/g} de −20 o quedar {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizado{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: El objetivo de este ataque debe superar una prueba de fortaleza de Agilidad con una penalización de −20 o quedar inmovilizado.

languages.text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-20{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}减值{/g}。若未能通过检定，则会陷入{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态。
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 受到攻击的目标需要进行敏捷抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-20减值。若未能通过检定，则会陷入定身状态。

languages.text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} d'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agilité{/g} avec une {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}pénalité{/g} de −20, sans quoi elle est {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisée{/g}.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: La cible de cette attaque doit réussir un test de résistance d'Agilité avec une pénalité de −20, sans quoi elle est immobilisée.

languages.text: この攻撃のターゲットは、−20の{g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}ペナルティ{/g}で{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}敏捷性{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}になる。
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: この攻撃のターゲットは、−20のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。
この攻撃のターゲットは、−20のペナルティで敏捷性抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると移動不可になる。

languages.text: Das Ziel dieses Angriffs muss eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Beweglichkeit{/g} mit einem {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}Abzug{/g} von -20 bestehen, um nicht {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} zu werden.
languages.original_text: The target of this attack must pass an {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerAgility}Agility{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −20 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} or become {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Das Ziel dieses Angriffs muss eine Widerstandsprobe auf Beweglichkeit mit einem Abzug von -20 bestehen, um nicht gelähmt zu werden.
